# useLocalParticipant (hook)

The useLocalParticipant hook the state of the local participant.

## Import

```typescript
import { useLocalParticipant } from '@livekit/components-react';
```

{% partial file="p_usage.md" /%}

## Parameters

| Parameter | Type                                                                | Description  |
| --------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------ |
| options   | [UseLocalParticipantOptions](./react/uselocalparticipantoptions.md) | _(Optional)_ |

**Returns:**

{ isMicrophoneEnabled: boolean; isScreenShareEnabled: boolean; isCameraEnabled: boolean; microphoneTrack: TrackPublication \| undefined; cameraTrack: TrackPublication \| undefined; localParticipant: LocalParticipant; }
